member.name: T:Enterprise.DI.Core.Lifetime.Attributes.Abstract.ServiceRegistrationAttribute
member.summary: Abstract attribute to define common properties for service lifetime registration.

member.name: P:Enterprise.DI.Core.Lifetime.Attributes.Abstract.ServiceRegistrationAttribute.AsMatchingInterface
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the class should be registered as a service for its matching interface only. When set to true, the class is registered as a service for the interface that matches its name, ignoring other implemented interfaces.

member.name: P:Enterprise.DI.Core.Lifetime.Attributes.Abstract.ServiceRegistrationAttribute.AsImplementedInterfaces
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the class should be registered as a service for all interfaces it implements. This is the default behavior. When set to true, the class is registered as a service for each interface it implements.

member.name: P:Enterprise.DI.Core.Lifetime.Attributes.Abstract.ServiceRegistrationAttribute.AsSelf
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the class should be registered as a service under its own type. When set to true, the class is registered as a service under its own type.

member.name: T:Enterprise.DI.Core.Lifetime.Attributes.ScopedServiceAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to indicate that a class should be registered with a scoped lifetime in the DI container.

member.name: T:Enterprise.DI.Core.Lifetime.Attributes.SingletonServiceAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to indicate that a class should be registered with a singleton lifetime in the DI container.

member.name: T:Enterprise.DI.Core.Lifetime.Attributes.TransientServiceAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to indicate that a class should be registered with a transient lifetime in the DI container.
